sentence: Monday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 6,213.13.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.55 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1.3 to 1 ratio.
There were 1264 advancers and 1648 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 17 stocks reached a 52 week high and 53 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.08% for the day; a total of -4.37 points.
Ulta Beauty, Inc. ( ULTA ) had the largest percent change down (-4.09%) while Ctrip.com International, Ltd. ( CTRP ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.45%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .13% for the day; a total of 29.24 points.
Nike, Inc. ( NKE ) had the largest percent change down (-2.44%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.16%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
